name: Under The Shack
description: Under The Shack is about a college girl on her way home from school. On her way home from school her car breaks down and she is left stranded waiting for a ride from her sister in the rain. She chooses to go inside a shack and that is where everything falls apart. Stumbling a cross an old mostly abandoned facility she uncovers a corrupt company that was suppose to be dissolved long ago. Now she is forced to try to escape before her sister shows up and leaves. Roughly an hour game play (yes short) the introduction to a much larger series is under way.
